item.description:
Join me for STUMP! Trivia at McFadden's on Wednesday, Jan 12th. Trivia starts at 6:30pm. (Website says 8pm, they LIE.) The wonderful Mimi is the trivia jockey here. Not sure of the prizes for winning but McFadden's boasts $1 sliders and 10CENT wings (40 different flavors). I have yet to try this particular trivia room but if I can get a regular team together, we can do this on a regular basis!

Check out http://mbta.com... ... or http://www.hopstop.co... ... to create your route by public transit. Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail). These subway stations are no more than a ten (10) minute walk.

McFadden's Web Page

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

Put the insignificant information in your head to use in the trivia contest, which begins at 6:30 and ends at about 8:30-9pm. Intriguing questions, fairly run, at a good pace and great interlude music. Some previous categories have been Science, Music, History, Geography, Literature, Sports, TV, Art, Business, & Movies.

Stump! Trivia rules:

1) To be eligible for prizes, teams are limited to six players. Be aware, teams with less than six players and have one of the top three scores, win first or second place.

2) The trivia jockey (TJ) provides Stump! sheets, on which to keep your team score. Write the categories as the TJ reads them, and keep track of the points you've wagered.

3) When the TJ asks a question, you have one song to write your team name, your answer, and your wager on an answer ticket and hand it in. You can wager 1, 3, 5, or 7 points in the first two quarters, and 2, 4, 6, or 8 points in the last two quarters. You can only use each value ONCE per quarter.

4) There are three bonus rounds where you can earn lots of extra points! Your TJ will explain how they work.

5) No shouting out answers, and absolutely no using cellphones or other devices to look up answers!
Teams breaking this rule are disqualified.

6) Have fun and good luck.
item.name: Stump! Trivia at McFadden's near Faneuil Hall **CANCELLED**
